Blog.post: This thing is for cool people and the cool things they get up to Yey GO TEAM!
Just Give Me One Chance To Feature You With Sunshine

3.08am I realise that sitting here for the time I have is not a good thing Not socialising with anybody while listening to the same music over and over can make one insane Needing to say something to somebody but not being able to put it into words, for you already have explained it to them and for them to disagree, is not a nice feeling There is a blind spot in my head, a bullet-shaped hole where the answers should be. Call it denial One Day A Lemming Will Fly, One Day They Will Realise, One Day Destinies Will Collide, On That Day She Will Realise The past is a puzzle, Like a broken mirror, As you piece it together, You cut yourself. Your image keeps shifting, and you change with it.It could destroy you,drive you mad.It could set you free.
Well, sitting here for 8 hrs waiting for people to come on MSN has made me realise how crap my life is Well, that's knackered it
2:51am and nobody is on MSN What's wrong with the world? People shouldn't sleep, they should stay awake and have fun and kill...I mean...ermm...Look over there! A three-headed monkey! *Runs away*
Here's a few more signs I've made which I think are nice...
This is a sign I made, which I think is nice I know how to put pics on this thing now which will be useful...

The 6 weeks or whatever nowadays holiday is a long and boring and crap time, where nothing happens Soon I will go insane and stay up until 6am every night/morning then wake up at either 12pm or 6pm DEATH Yeh..so... Today wasn't really thrilling, some people came round who I know and we played Vice City and Max Payne 2 all day, but considering that I've played them two SO much that it hurts, I wasn't really happy Anyway, I have to go move guitars now
Something happened today which only 3 people know, and i'm not saying what it is But it's made me really down, and ice cream can't even cheer me up
